title: After Making Landfall, Hurricane Arthur Cruises North
teaser: After striking North Carolina last night, the storm is now moving up towards New England, says Boston meteorologist Eric Fisher.
contentencoded:
Hurricane Arthur headed back out to sea this morning after making landfall in North Carolina overnight. Now it’s moving on up to the waters off New England.

Meteorologist Eric Fisher of WBZ-TV in Boston brings us the latest.

Guest

  • Eric Fisher, chief meteorologist, WBZ-TV, Boston. He tweets @ericfisher.
